bone2: Bone of body, control the waist.
bone3: Bone of body, control the chest.
bone5: Connecting head with body, control the neck.
bone6: Bone of head, control the head.
bone7: Bone of left arm, control the left arm.
bone8: Bone of left arm, control the left big arm.
bone9: Bone of left arm, control the left forearm.
bone10: Bone of left arm, control the left hand.
bone11: Bone of right arm, control the right arm.
bone12: Bone of right arm, control the right big arm.
bone13: Bone of right arm, control the right forearm.
bone14: Bone bone of right arm, control the right hand.
bone15: Bone of left leg, control the left leg.
bone16: Bone of left leg, control the left shin.
bone17: Bone of left leg, control the left sole
bone18: Bone of right leg, control the right leg.
bone19: Bone of right leg, control the right shin.
bone20: Bone of right leg, control the right sole
